secondBlock.title: Measurement accuracy ensures safety
secondBlock.description: The laboratory provides services of initial and periodic verification for gas analytical equipment, and calibration of all types of instrumentation, including stationary, portable and mobile gas analytical equipment (gas analyzers, detectors and sensors) to monitor concentration of one or more substances in the air or gaseous environments.
secondBlock.subtitle: Akbarys has its own laboratory to calibrate and verify measuring instrumentation (MI)

texts.title: Advanced equipment
descriptions: The laboratory is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment of leading domestic and world manufacturers, in which certified cal gas mixtures are used for verification.

It has the means of verification, consisting of initial and measuring accessories, allowing to perform verifications under the accreditation scope. This takes into account the conditions of their operation established in the technical (operating) documents, and also personnel is dedicated to maintain such means.

texts.title: Qualified personnel
descriptions: The laboratory employs 8 specialists qualified as «Physical and Chemical Measurement Verifier».
The verification lab personnel are qualified verifiers taking regular certification and improving their professional level on metrology.

thirdBlock.title: Accredited by NAC
thirdBlock.description: The laboratory is accredited for GOST ISO / IEC 17025-2009 «General requirements for the competence of testing and calibration laboratories» by the National Accreditation Center, national accreditation body in the field of conformity assessment. Accreditation certificate No. KZ.P.09.1363 dated February 18, 2018.

fourthBlock.title: Continuous development
fourthBlock.description: A large number of different types of measuring instruments are included in the scope of accreditation of the verification laboratory. Every year, the laboratory expands its scope of accreditation by mastering new types of verifications of measuring instruments.

fivthBlock.title: Permits
fivthBlock.description: Measuring instrumentation are verified not only as per GOST ISO / IEC 17025-2009 «General requirements for the competence of testing and calibration laboratories», but also under the Laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan (LRK) «On ensuring the uniformity of measurements» and «On accreditation in the field of conformity assessment».

certificates.title: Verification laboratory accreditation
certificates.description: The verification laboratory is accredited for compliance with GOST ISO/IEC 17025-2019

certificates.title: Calibration laboratory accreditation
certificates.description: Calibration laboratory is accredited for compliance with GOST ISO/IEC 17025-2019
